add_definitions(-D_CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS)
add_library(lua SHARED
lapi.c
lauxlib.c
lbaselib.c
lbitlib.c

lcorolib.c
lctype.c
ldblib.c
ldebug.c
ldo.c
ldump.c
lfunc.c
lgc.c
linit.c
liolib.c
llex.c
lmathlib.c
lmem.c
loadlib.c
lobject.c
lopcodes.c
loslib.c
lparser.c
lstate.c
lstring.c
lstrlib.c
ltable.c
ltablib.c
ltm.c
lua.c
lundump.c
lvm.c
lzio.c
)
